nodes.text: Beryann Raleg joined the Rebel Alliance along with Bren Derlin after Senator Galen Derlin's assassination. Prior to the Battle of Hoth, he attended Princess Leia's pilot briefing before heading to his fighter and flying as Blue Eight during the battle.
Raleg was first identified in "Rogues Gallery: Clearance for Immediate Launch" in Star Wars Insider 146.
